snippet.title: Algebra 2 – The Remainder and Factor Theorems
snippet.description:
Yay Math In Studio lends a "hand" to evaluating polynomial functions and equations using synthetic division (specifically, synthetic substitution). We could directly plug into the function, but what fun would ONLY doing that be? Indeed many ways of finding out the roots and zeros exist. Remember that if the polynomial has a factor, then it divides evenly, and the remainder is zero. YAY MATH!

Learning should be always be fun and connective. Please visit http://www.yaymath.org for:
all videos
free quizzes
free worksheets
debut book on how to connect with and inspire students
entire courses you can download
